items: Hi! I'm IQlvlZero and here's a bit about me
I'm a music creator (when I feel like it)
I play too many video games
I'm nonbinary - I use they/them pronouns
And I hated every second of making this site!

content.text:
I've been working on the same damn song for months now, but all my creative juices are dying. So I've been hoping that I can just make it work out in the end...
but I don't think I will be.
ALSO I STRUGGLE WITH THIS WHOLE CODING THING SO IF YOU CAN HELP ME PLEASE DO
